name: HellScape (Zeemcd)
description:
Welcome to HellScape:

HellScape is a Luftrausers inspired arcade game in which you are tasked with killing an endless horde of demons, but be careful, even the environment is trying to kill you; It is Hell after all. 

Avoid falling rocks, sulfur clouds and lava spouts while you battle demons to gain the highest score possible.

Controls:

W / Up Arrow: Add thrust
A / Left Arrow: Turn Left
D / Right Arrow: Turn Right
X: Shoot

Healing:
You begin passive healing when you are not shooting and after two seconds of not taking any damage. Health is indicated by the white ring around you.

Please fill out the survey.
